basic.floral_language:
Lantana camara 
Floriography: cheerful, vivid, joy
Lantana camara changes its colors during its blooming. Has emerald green oval leaves, rough on both sides with short hairs. Flowers small, forming a dense hemispherical shape with orange, pink, yellow or other colors on the same inflorescence. Commonly used in the garden landscaping. Has an effect of repelling mosquitoes as the plant has a strong stimulating scent.
Lantana camara likes adequate sunlight. Flowering in May to October for 2-3 weeks viewing.
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-October, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color yellow, orange, white, purple

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 10-15 days in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
